ch0251_40_onion/0101_0701_02_10:
If you enjoyed the night festival...th-that’d make
me happy!
ch0251_40_onion/7101_0701_01_10:
S-seems like pumpkins are a must at the
night festivals...
ch0251_40_onion/7101_0701_02_10:
So people talk to me a lot when I’m with
Gourgeist...
ch0251_40_onion/7101_0701_03_10:
It makes me nervous, but I’m very happy that
Gourgeist is getting attention...
ch0251_40_onion/7102_0701_01_10:
I was a bit scared to go to a festival with so
many people...
ch0251_40_onion/7102_0701_02_10:
But Gourgeist and Gengar looked like they were
having so much fun battling...
ch0251_40_onion/7102_0701_03_10:
And they were happily eating sweets... So I’m
glad I went.
ch0251_40_onion/7103_0701_01_10:
I can’t take my mask off, so I decided to dress up
by making it look like a pumpkin...
ch0251_40_onion/7103_0701_02_10:
When I put this mask on, it makes me feel
confident, like Gourgeist...
ch0251_40_onion/7103_0701_03_10: Or at least I wish that were the case...
ch0251_40_onion/7104_0701_01_10:
I can hear people’s voices coming from
Gourgeist’s torso...
ch0251_40_onion/7104_0701_02_10:
And I feel as if those voices get even louder
during festivals...
ch0251_40_onion/7104_0701_03_10: Maybe everyone wants to join the festival...
ch0251_40_onion/7105_0701_01_10:
Gourgeist looks at you a lot,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]...
ch0251_40_onion/7105_0701_02_10: Maybe he wants you to join us...
ch0251_40_onion/7105_0701_03_10:
Oh, don’t worry! I meant that I think he wants you
to dress up like me...
ch0251_40_onion/1701_0701_01_10:
Gourgeist picked this up from somewhere. Please
take it with you...
ch0251_40_onion/1701_0702_01_10:
I promise it’s nothing weird. Don’t be afraid to
use it...
ch0251_40_onion/2501_0701_01_10:
Surprisingly, there are a lot of ghost Pokémon that
try to take humans to the afterlife...
ch0251_40_onion/2501_0701_02_10:
But Pokémon are Pokémon, so if they try to
take you...
ch0251_40_onion/2501_0701_03_10:
they might let you go if you offer them a lot
of sweets...
ch0251_40_onion/2501_0702_01_10:
And if you want to collect loads of sweets, you’ve
got to win many battles...
ch0251_40_onion/2501_0702_02_10:
Ah, but the Pokémon might eat them as you’re
collecting them...
ch0251_40_onion/2511_0701_01_10: I-if Gourgeist and I do well...
ch0251_40_onion/2511_0701_02_10:
Do you think people will see the strength of
ghost Pokémon?
ch0251_40_onion/2511_0701_03_10: If that’s the case, I’m gonna give it my all!
ch0251_40_onion/2511_0702_01_10:
It’d be great if I could show that ghost Pokémon
can be reliable friends.
ch0251_40_onion/2511_0702_02_10: I-I’ve found a goal to aim for during festivals!
ch0251_40_onion/3001_0701_01_10:
I was so excited for tonight’s festivities, I put on
my costume at the crack of dawn...
ch0251_40_onion/3003_0701_01_10:
I’ve got loads to do to get ready for tonight...
But ghost Pokémon keep pesterin’ me to play
with them...
ch0251_40_onion/3005_0701_01_10:
Nighttime’s when ghost Pokémon and I are in
tip-top shape!
